title: Drawing, 1938-88-1725
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
markings:
Watermark: Lily in oval, under bird, over B
Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457e)
inscribed:
Under entablature: 13
Inscription: Porta p[er] la Trinita al/ Palazoo al corso
Inscription: Porta della M[arche] se Lepri ridot-/ ta piu large, p[er] commodo di Mgr. Ruffo Tesorierre
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Top row: roughly outlined sketch with measurements. An arched door opening. Bottow row: an arched door opening with an entablature including a triglyph frieze. Outline of a door opening.
